title: Zarbee's Children's Nighttime Cough Syrup + Immune, 2-6 Years Natural Mixed Berry
description: Shop Children's Nighttime Cough Syrup + Immune, 2-6 Years Natural Mixed Berry and read reviews at Walgreens. Pickup & Same Day Delivery available on most store items.
cleaned_text: Immune, 2-6 Years Natural Mixed Berry4.0fl oz How would you like to receive this item ? Description Zarbee's Kids Cough + Immune Syrup Nighttime is specifically tailored for children 2-6 with carefully selected and scientifically supported ingredients like dark honey, proven to soothe coughs, vitamin D, Zinc and elderberry extract to support the body's natural immune system, and chamomile to calm the body and mind before bed.*. Naturally sweetened, the only sugar in our bottles comes from our soothing dark honey, kids will love the natural mixed berry flavor. From the #1 Pediatrician Recommended Cough Syrup brand, Zarbee's cough syrups are a safe and effective way to calm coughs associated with hoarseness and irritants. Free of drugs, alcohol, artificial sweeteners, added flavors or dyes, or high fructose corn syrup. Allergen-Friendly: Gluten, dairy, egg, and peanut free. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Made in USAShake well before using. Take only as directed. Take as needed before bedtime, not to exceed 2 servings per 24 hours. If taking the daytime and nighttime products together, do not exceed 2 servings of Cough + Immune per 24 hours. For occasional use. Talk with your doctor before use if your child is taking medicine or is under a doctor's care for a medical condition. Re-close cap tightly after each use. ©Zarbee's, Inc. [Show More](javascript:void(0)) Product Specifications IngredientsWater, Natural Flavor, Citric Acid Nutrition FactsServing Size 1 tspServings Per Container About 22 Nutritional Information % Daily Value Total Carbohydrate 5g 2% Calories 20 Total Sugars 4g Includes Added Sugars 4g Vitamin D3 (as cholecalciferol) 1.25mcg Zinc (as zinc gluconate) of Honey 6g Black Elderberry (Sambucus nigra) Fruit Extract 25mg German Chamomile Flower Extract 50mg WarningsIf condition persists or worsens, stop use and consult a doctor. Do not use if your child is allergic to any of the ingredients, as well as ingredients in the Asteraceae family, including ragweed. Do not exceed recommended serving. This product may cause drowsiness. Combining with other products that cause sedation may increase drowsiness. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.
